xwikidoc.title: How do I modify a text displayed in the PhenoTips user interface?
xwikidoc.content:
Most of the texts displayed in the PhenoTips user interface are generated using translation keys processed by the [[localization service>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Localization+Module]]. This is part of our effort to make PhenoTips available in multiple languages. The translations are defined in ##ApplicationResources[_<language_key>].properties## files bundled with each PhenoTips component.
To override a specific translation, we strongly advise against modifying the ##ApplicationResources.properties## file directly, since this will make upgrades difficult for you. Instead, a practice that allows for more flexibility is to create an [[XWiki Translation document>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Localization+Module#HRegisterawikitranslation]] and specify the desired modification in that document instead.
=== Example === How to change the label for the patient's date of birth from "Date of birth" to "Birth date": * To find the translation key, you could search for "Date of birth" in the PhenoTips ##*.properties## files. You will find it in [[##components/patient-data/impl/src/main/resources/ApplicationResources.properties##>>https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/blob/45d369f26a77ef1b0a27398bd481e345e5b97651/components/patient-data/impl/src/main/resources/ApplicationResources.properties#L45]], and you will see the translation key for the field is ##PhenoTips.PatientClass_date_of_birth##. As a general rule, translation keys for property labels have the format ##<classname>_<propertyname>## (as explained [[in the localization conventions documentation>>http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/L10N%20Conventions#HTranslatingXClasses]]: * Create a new XWiki document for translations, e.g. ##PhenoTips/MyTranslationOverrides## ** Open ##https:~//<mydomain>/bin/edit/PhenoTips/MyTranslationOverrides?editor=object## ** Add a ##XWiki.TranslationDocumentClass## object to it ** Set the scope to ##Wiki## ** Save ** Navigate to the document's content editor: ##https:~//<mydomain>/bin/edit/PhenoTips/MyTranslationOverrides## (just as before, but without the ##?editor=object## query string) ** (((Enter your translation overrides as ##key=value## pairs, one per line. For example:
{{code}} PhenoTips.PatientClass_date_of_birth=Birth date {{/code}} ))) ** Save ** Navigate to any patient form to see the results.
